title: Non-LoL Characters
body: Dear Riot are you able to add other characters from other Game's e.g. Link, Kratos, War or can you make character inspired Toons for LoL or skins.

replies.body: Except in four months that will get you permabanned with no warning.

It makes sense, people already get accidentally permabanned for it, and this can't be undone.
As it causes a bunch of complaining it is far easier to just outright ban the issue at hand so that no one will be accidentally banned.

No, they wont.

All characters within the game are created by Riot, and they wont license characters from other intellectual properties.
